system.description:
A bugle or hunting horn with the power to cause cave-ins when sounded.

  • Without command word: A cave-in occurs directly above the character.

  • With command word: The character may aim at a section of roof within 60’. There is a [[/r 1d100]]{90%} chance that a cave-in occurs in the desired area and a [[/r 1d100]]{10%} chance that it occurs directly above the character.

  • Outdoors: Only if blown without speaking the command word: a hail of [[/r 2d6]] stones cascades onto the character. Each causes [[/r 1d6]] damage.

  • Indoors / underground: The ceiling collapses, causing [[/r 6d6]] damage to all in a 10’ radius. (Save vs paralysis for half.)
